  • Method Details

    • displayFano

      public String displayFano(int table)
      Displays a specific Fano octonion table out of 480
      Parameters:
      table - which table out of 480
      Returns:
      a String of the output

    • displayCayleyDickson

      public String displayCayleyDickson(int degree, int cdz, int cdo)
      Displays a specific hypercomplex multiplication table with Cayley-Dickson permutation numbers (cdz, cdo)
      Parameters:
      degree - degree hypercomplex, 2 = quaternions, 3 = octonions, 4 = sedonions, etc
      cdz - Cayley-Dickson permutations used as splitting bit, down in recursion
      cdo - Cayley-Dickson permutations used as recombination bit, up in recursion
      Returns:
      a String of the output

    • displayGalois

      public String displayGalois(int m, int n)
      Displays a specific Galois multiplication field
      Parameters:
      m - must be prime to work correctly, however it is not error-corrected yet and will output garbage
      n - power of m, m^n, GF(m,n)
      Returns:
      a String of the output

    • permutationsOfPermutations

      public String permutationsOfPermutations(int length)
      Outputs permutation compositions in both list and grid form
      Parameters:
      length - length of array to permute
      Returns:
      the symmetric group in String form

    • fanoTest

      public void fanoTest()
      Calls Fano.fanoTest(), which does comparisons between permuted Cayley-Dickson octonions, Fano numbering triplets, and the 480 automorphisms produced by the E8 roots of each of these

    • displaySet

      public void displaySet(int degree, int cdz, int cdo, int table, int m, int n, int length)
      Displays on a Swing text area various multiplication tables and permutation compositions
      Parameters:
      degree - degree hypercomplex, 2 = quaternions, 3 = octonions, etc.
      cdz - Cayley-Dickson down recursion factoradic
      cdo - Cayley-Dickson up recursion factoradic
      table - Fano table number, 0-480
      m - Galois field (m,_), a prime number
      n - prime m to the n power
      length - length of permutation alphabet

    • compareCayleyDickson

      public void compareCayleyDickson(int degree)
      Calls the function that compares permuted Cayley-Dickson multiplication tables against other permuted Cayley-DIckson multiplication tables and displays it
      Parameters:
      degree - degree hypercomplex, 2 = quaternions, 3 = octonions, etc
